x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
When using Space Editor to update the Space Type on multiple Locations, the field values from Space Type record are not being saved on the Location records.
It doesn't appear that the values are actually saving for anything other than Space Type. If the record is already open, you can see the field values change, but there are no blue circles next to any of the other fields to indicate a change was made and if I refresh the record none of the new values are there.
Issue found in Nuvolo : Qatar, Romania
Reproduction Steps :
-Open Floor in Space Editor -Hold ctrl key and clicked multiple locations from the map, then click the Update ("Update multiple space attributes") button -chose a value for the "Space Type" field and click "Update"
If I already have the any location records open before updating, I can confirm that the Space Type field was updated and that the following fields also updated to match the field values from the Space Type record:
Seat Status Usage Employee Assignable Storage Rentable Area Rollup Usable Area Rollup Assignable Area Rollup Primary Use Reservable Handicap Accessible Proration Type Capacity Code Capacity Workspace Capacity Indicator Flex Capacity Indicator Share Ratio
Expected Result: These field values would be saved on the Location records
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: Space Editor - Multi-Update unsuccessful
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Reach out to Nuvolo Technical Engineering team for the update set on SFM-9942 and install it.
